display_long_description:
Game Background

ezContinental, a world full of fantasy and magic, is facing the invasion of dark forces. Now, this mysterious realm has broken its boundaries and poured into reality. As the last guardian, ezDefensor, you will utilize the elemental forces of fire, ice, and electricity to construct defenses in reality and resist the invasion of monsters.

Game Features

——Unique AR Experience: The perfect fusion of the magical world and reality brings players an immersive gaming experience. 
——Gesture-Controlled Magic: Through gesture recognition technology, players can easily unleash powerful elemental magic with their hands. 
——Rich Magic Combinations: The three elements of fire, ice, and electricity can be combined to create various magic skills, providing players with diverse tactical choices. 
——Perfect Combination of Strategy and Operation: Not only does it require reasonable tactical strategies, but also agile operational responses to successfully resist the invasion of monsters.

Target Users：Teens and adults (13+ or applicable age in user's region),  see our privacy policy for detail.
